sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Populating the values for test_utterance and expected_intent columns by using the utterance reference</description> <name>Update NLU Batch Test Result columns</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var testResultGr = new GlideRecord("nlu_batch_test_result"); testResultGr.query(); while (testResultGr.next()) { testResultGr.setValue("test_utterance", testResultGr.utterance.utterance); testResultGr.setValue("expected_intent", testResultGr.utterance.intent); testResultGr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-17 04:51:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>004919daa3221110f066d78446fcda66</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update NLU Batch Test Result columns</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features" source="sn_nlu_workbench">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_004919daa3221110f066d78446fcda66</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-08 07:29:31</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update NLU Batch Test Result columns
